verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:25
verses.text: And Jeremiah lamented for Josiah: and all the singing men and the singing women spake of Josiah in their lamentations to this day, and made them an ordinance in Israel: and, behold, they are written in the lamentations.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:26
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Josiah, and his goodness, according to that which was written in the law of the Lord,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 35:27
verses.text: And his deeds, first and last, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah.
